Package camzup.core

Class Knot2

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.Knot2
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<Knot2>
public class Knot2
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<Knot2>
Organizes the vectors the shape a Bezier curve into a coordinate (or anchor point), fore handle (the following control point) and rear handle (the preceding control point).

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  Knot2.AbstrEasing
    An abstract class to facilitate the creation of knot easing functions.
    static class  Knot2.Lerp
    A functional class to ease between two knots with linear interpolation.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    Vec2 coord
    The spatial coordinate of the knot.
    Vec2 foreHandle
    The handle which warps the curve segment heading away from the knot along the direction of the curve.
    Vec2 rearHandle
    The handle which warps the curve segment heading towards the knot along the direction of the curve.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Knot2()
    The default constructor.
    Knot2​(float xCoord, float yCoord)
    Creates a knot from a coordinate.

    Creates a knot from real numbers.

    Creates a knot from real numbers.

    Creates a knot from a source knot.

    Creates a knot from a coordinate.

    Creates a knot from a coordinate and fore handle.
    Knot2​(Vec2 coord, Vec2 foreHandle, Vec2 rearHandle)
    Creates a knot from a series of vectors.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Knot2 alignHandles()
    Aligns this knot's handles in the same direction while preserving their magnitude.
    Knot2 alignHandlesBackward()
    Aligns this knot's fore handle to its rear handle while preserving magnitude.
    Knot2 alignHandlesForward()
    Aligns this knot's rear handle to its fore handle while preserving magnitude.
    Knot2 clone()
    Creates a new knot with the coordinate and handles of this knot.
    int compareTo​(Knot2 knot)
    Compares this knot to another based on a comparison between coordinates.
    boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
    Tests to see if this knot equals an object
    static Knot2 fromPolar​(float cosa, float sina, float radius, float handleMag, Knot2 target)
    Creates a knot from polar coordinates, where the knot's fore handle is tangent to the radius.
    static Knot2 fromPolar​(float angle, float radius, float handleMag, Knot2 target)
    Creates a knot from polar coordinates, where the knot's fore handle is tangent to the radius.
    int hashCode()
    Returns the knot's hash code based on those of its three constituent vectors.
    Knot2 mirrorHandles()
    Mirrors this knot's handles.
    Knot2 mirrorHandlesBackward()
    Sets the forward-facing handle to mirror the rear-facing handle: the fore will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the rear.
    Knot2 mirrorHandlesForward()
    Sets the rear-facing handle to mirror the forward-facing handle: the rear will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the fore.
    static Knot2 mix​(Knot2 origin, Knot2 dest, float step, Knot2 target, Knot2.AbstrEasing easingFunc)
    Mixes two knots together by a step in [0.0, 1.0] with the help of an easing function.
    Knot2 reverse()
    Reverses the knot's direction by swapping the fore- and rear-handles.
    Knot2 rotateForeHandleZ​(float radians)
    Rotates this knot's fore handle by an angle in radians.
    Knot2 rotateForeHandleZ​(float cosa, float sina)
    Rotates this knot's fore handle by the cosine and sine of an angle.
    Knot2 rotateHandlesZ​(float radians)
    Rotates this knot's fore and rear handles by an angle in radians.
    Knot2 rotateHandlesZ​(float cosa, float sina)
    Rotates this knot's fore and rear handles by the cosine and sine of an angle.
    Knot2 rotateRearHandleZ​(float radians)
    Rotates this knot's rear handle by an angle in radians.
    Knot2 rotateRearHandleZ​(float cosa, float sina)
    Rotates this knot's rear handle by the cosine and sine of an angle.
    Knot2 rotateZ​(float radians)
    Rotates this knot around the z axis by an angle in radians.
    Knot2 rotateZ​(float cosa, float sina)
    Rotates a knot around the z axis.
    Knot2 scale​(float scale)
    Scales this knot by a factor.
    Knot2 scale​(Vec2 scale)
    Scales this knot by a non-uniform scalar.
    Knot2 scaleForeHandleBy​(float scalar)
    Scales the fore handle by a factor.
    Knot2 scaleForeHandleTo​(float magnitude)
    Scales the fore handle to a magnitude.
    Knot2 scaleHandlesBy​(float scalar)
    Scales both the fore and rear handle by a factor.
    Knot2 scaleHandlesTo​(float magnitude)
    Scales both the fore and rear handle to a magnitude.
    Knot2 scaleRearHandleBy​(float scalar)
    Scales the rear handle by a factor.
    Knot2 scaleRearHandleTo​(float magnitude)
    Scales the rear handle to a magnitude
    Knot2 set​(float xCoord, float yCoord)

    • mirrorHandlesBackward

      public Knot2 mirrorHandlesBackward()

      Returns:
      this knot

    • mirrorHandlesForward

      public Knot2 mirrorHandlesForward()
      Sets the rear-facing handle to mirror the forward-facing handle: the rear will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the fore.
      Returns:
      this knot

    • rotateZ

      public Knot2 rotateZ​(float cosa, float sina)
      Rotates a knot around the z axis. Accepts calculated sine and cosine of an angle, so that collections of knots can be efficiently rotated without repeatedly calling cos and sin.
      Parameters:
      cosa - cosine of the angle
      sina - sine of the angle
      Returns:
      this knot

      public Knot2 set​(java.lang.String xCoord, java.lang.String yCoord, java.lang.String xFore, java.lang.String yFore, java.lang.String xRear, java.lang.String yRear)
      Attempts to set the components of this knot from Strings using Float.parseFloat(String) . If a NumberFormatException is thrown, the component is set to zero.
      Parameters:
      xCoord - the x coordinate string
      yCoord - the y coordinate string
      xFore - the x fore handle string
      yFore - the y fore handle string
      xRear - the x rear handle string
      yRear - the y rear handle string
      Returns:
      this knot

    • fromPolar

      public static Knot2 fromPolar​(float cosa, float sina, float radius, float handleMag, Knot2 target)
      Creates a knot from polar coordinates, where the knot's fore handle is tangent to the radius.
      Parameters:
      cosa - the cosine of the angle
      sina - the sine of the angle
      radius - the radius
      handleMag - the length of the handles
      target - the output knot
      Returns:
      the knot

    • fromPolar

      public static Knot2 fromPolar​(float angle, float radius, float handleMag, Knot2 target)
      Creates a knot from polar coordinates, where the knot's fore handle is tangent to the radius.
      Parameters:
      angle - the angle in radians
      radius - the radius
      handleMag - the length of the handles
      target - the output knot
      Returns:
      the knot

    • mix

      public static Knot2 mix​(Knot2 origin, Knot2 dest, float step, Knot2 target, Knot2.AbstrEasing easingFunc)
      Mixes two knots together by a step in [0.0, 1.0] with the help of an easing function.
      Parameters:
      origin - the original knot
      dest - the destination knot
      step - the step
      target - the output knot
      easingFunc - the easing function
      Returns:
      the mix
